mapper.update: update post set post_title = #{postTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, post_authorid = #{postAuthorid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, post_created_by = #{postCreatedBy,jdbcType=CHAR}, post_created_at = #{postCreatedAt,jdbcType=INTEGER}, post_content = #{postContent,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where pid = #{pid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select pid, post_title, post_authorid, post_created_by, post_created_at, post_content from post
